result.longName: Guangdong Lyric Robot Automation Co., Ltd.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Guangdong Lyric Robot Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of intelligent equipment in China. It provides EV prismatic, cylindrical Li, and EV pouch battery cells; coating machines, laser notching and slitting machines, laser cutting and stacking machines, winding machines, long prismatic cell assembly line, forming and capacity grading machines, module and pack line, x-ray inspection machines, and ultrasonic pre- and final welding machines; stacking and forming, and punching and sealing machines; nondestructive slicers and PERC laser grooving equipment; fuel cell stack assembly lines and molded graphite bipolar plate manufacturing solutions; motor rotor assembly lines and three-in-one e-motor assembly solutions; intelligent three-dimensional warehouses; and laser welding, marking, cutting, and cleaning machines. Guangdong Lyric Robot Automation Co., Ltd. was founded in 2014 and is based in Huizhou, China.
